titre: How to Place a Toilet Rim Block
intro: An Instructable on how to place a toilet rim block ... how hard can it be? A few months ago I discovered this life hack and made a video of it. This video has been viewed hundreds of thousands of times and the reactions have all been amazed and positive. How did I get this wrong in all these years is the most common response ... Video Tutorial It is not an extensive project as you are used to from me, but a great Life Hack, that's why I want to share it with you!
intro_items: An Instructable on how to place a toilet rim block ... how hard can it be?

A few months ago I discovered this life hack and made a video of it. This video has been viewed hundreds of thousands of times and the reactions have all been amazed and positive. How did I get this wrong in all these years is the most common response ...
It is not an extensive project as you are used to from me, but a great Life Hack, that's why I want to share it with you!

etapes.html:
1. Step 1: The Trick

Ã‰tapes :

  1. As indicated, this is a very simple hack!
  2. To start, remove the toilet rim block from the packaging. Instead of hanging it with the hook over the edge of the toilet, push the hook under the edge of the toilet. Done!
  3. The toilet rim block sticks much better and you no longer suffer from the hook that hangs over the edge, attracts dirt and gets in the way of cleaning! As you can see in the video, it sticks perfectly this way!
  4. I do recommend using gloves when removing. You did this in the traditional way, of course, but I wanted to give the tip anyway!
  5. Have fun with this life hack and see you soon!
